backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor defining submission types, authorization, storage mixins, user profiles, and query/update endpoints for submissions and health checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing tracked features, related files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files across components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/FFMPEG_SETUP.md: Placeholder markdown file with no content.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base and theme variables defining light and dark color schemes and core styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point bootstrapping the React application and loading main.tsx.
frontend/README.md: Frontend documentation outlining features, architecture, IC configuration, and key source files.
frontend/src/App.tsx: App router and root layout performing initial backend health checks and defining all student and admin routes.
frontend/src/backend.did.ts: Candid IDL definitions for the backend canister including types and service methods.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAudio: Allows admins to download audio blobs with inferred MIME type handling and filename generation.
Streams and plays audio from an ExternalBlob with loading and error states in an admin UI card.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminMedia: Renders a download button that fetches bytes from an ExternalBlob, determines MIME type, builds a Blob, and triggers a file download with a generated filename.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminSubmi: Provides a button to download a submission via backend actor, showing loading state and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminVideo: Loads a streaming URL from an ExternalBlob and displays a video player with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/admin/DeleteSubm: Offers a confirmation dialog to delete a submission using a mutation hook and redirects on success.
frontend/src/components/admin/ExportTool: Exports submission metadata to CSV client‑side and provides a placeholder ZIP export action.
Guards admin routes by checking admin status, displaying loading or access denied screens, and rendering children when authorized.
frontend/src/components/AppShell.tsx: Defines the main app layout with header, footer, admin navigation, and conditional rendering for the success page.
frontend/src/components/AudioRecorder.ts: Provides in-browser audio recording with preview, duration limits, error handling, and attachment of the final recording.
frontend/src/components/CanisterIdBanner: Displays a fixed banner showing the backend canister ID and whether it is valid.
frontend/src/components/LocalCaptchaChal: Implements a simple math-based CAPTCHA with regeneration and success/fail callbacks.
frontend/src/components/RuntimeIcConfigD: Shows runtime Internet Computer configuration details for debugging, including host and canister ID validity.
frontend/src/config/canisters.ts: Defines and validates the backend canister ID and exposes helpers for retrieving configuration status.
frontend/src/dev/ffmpegSmoke.ts: Empty placeholder file for ffmpeg-related development tests.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudioRecorder.ts: Implements audio recording with MediaRecorder, tracking state, timing, supported MIME types, and producing a final audio Blob.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, identity loading, and authentication state using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for backend health checks, admin checks, and fetching submissions via the actor API.
frontend/src/ic/actor.ts: Creates and manages mainnet backend actors, including anonymous caching and a health check utility.
frontend/src/ic/agent.ts: Provides a mainnet-configured HttpAgent factory with optional identity and cached anonymous agent support.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base and theme CSS defining light/dark mode color variables and global styling.
frontend/src/lib/adminApi.ts: Placeholder admin authentication API returning fallback responses since backend lacks admin endpoints.
frontend/src/lib/adminAuth.ts: Empty file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/lib/adminDownloads.ts: Implements admin-only submission download logic by fetching MP3 bytes from backend and triggering a browser download.
frontend/src/lib/adminSession.ts: Empty file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/lib/audio/audioDecodeErrors: Defines custom audio error types and utilities for identifying and generating user-friendly audio decoding error messages.
Provides utilities to detect MP3 support and convert recorded audio blobs to MP3 using Web Audio API and lamejs loaded from CDN.
frontend/src/lib/audioValidation.ts: Validates audio files by size, extension, and MIME type, and includes helpers to format file size and duration.
frontend/src/lib/csrf.ts: Implements placeholder CSRF token storage in sessionStorage and helpers to attach CSRF headers.
frontend/src/lib/downloads.ts: Helpers to trigger file downloads from blobs or URLs by programmatically creating anchor elements.
frontend/src/lib/ffmpeg/convertToMp3.ts: Empty placeholder file for future FFmpeg-based MP3 conversion.
frontend/src/lib/icActor.ts: Deprecated wrapper delegating backend actor creation and health checks to the shared actor factory.
frontend/src/lib/mediaMime.ts: Maps and normalizes MIME types and file extensions, and infers MIME types from metadata or filenames.
frontend/src/lib/safeText.ts: Provides simple text sanitization, truncation, and HTML escaping utilities.
frontend/src/lib/submissionFormat.ts: Formats timestamps, durations, and file sizes, and generates and displays submission IDs.
frontend/src/lib/videoValidation.ts: Deprecated video validation utilities for size, MIME type, and extension checks.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Displays all submissions with search, sorting, and error states, allowing admins to browse and filter student media submissions.
Checks admin permissions on load and conditionally redirects or shows an access‑denied message.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSettingsPa: Provides UI for adjusting admin settings like CAPTCHA and upload limits, with most changes currently client‑side only.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AuditLogPage.ts: Shows audit log filters and a placeholder log table, using client-side filtering while backend logging is unimplemented.
frontend/src/pages/admin/SubmissionDetai: Loads and displays detailed information for a single submission, including media playback and deletion controls.
frontend/src/pages/StudentUploadPage.tsx: Student upload form enabling audio file upload or recording, validation, backend submission, and progress tracking.
frontend/src/pages/SubmissionSuccessPage: Displays a simple success message after a submission completes.
frontend/src/types/lamejs.d.ts: Defines global TypeScript types for the lamejs MP3 encoder loaded via CDN.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, custom colors, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project state file describing canister ID mismatch issues, required fixes, and feature requests for centralizing backend canister configuration.
